paper_title: Emergency Parcel Dispatching and Structure Optimization of E-Commerce Logistics Network Based on CCNSGA-II
abstract_sentence: A refined forecasting model based on ARIMA-EBP neural network is constructed to forecast the daily cargo volume of each line from 2023-01-01 to 2023-01-31 A mixed-integer linear programming (MILP) model is established and a co-evolutionary non-dominated sequencing genetic algorithm (CCNSGA-II) is designed to achieve multi-objective optimization with the objective of minimizing the workload and balancing all packets as well as possible.
